post.author: thomas lee

comment.author: 이성기
comment.content: (2nd time)개인이름을 지명하면 쑥스레이... 다음부터 그러지 말그레이..

post.content:
Hi Scott... I do challenge you in breast stroke style when : anytime where : any swimming pool distance : 100 m
I have been swimming for about 40 days. I can swim 400 m in 25 minutes non-stop. I think I can keep up with you. After this challenge Spencer is next on the line then Steve.
Other news : Now I am in the popular group at River Grove swimming pool at 6:30 to 7:30 group.
My strategy : - Smile and hi first to everybody first 10 days - find who is the popular person out - ask questions of swimming - listen carefully like you really mean sincerely
By product : - friendship buildup : I have many friends - I start my day with my new found friends - good tips : without questions it could take longer - multiple tips from many : pick and choose and make my own - my running helped a lot used the same tactic - divide and conquer not faster but longer
Hi Scott come on down. Your ass is mine
post.title: I ask open challenge to Scott Lee
